definition: to the satisfaction of everyone
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
rapid/quick/speed/rate/soon/almost/to make haste/clever/sharp (of knives or wits)/forthright/plainspoken/gratified/pleased/pleasant
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Pressure from Mr Li looks, on the surface, to be paying off.
sentences.chinese: 表面看來，由於李總理的要求，安居工程大快人心。

sentences.english: Bo's crackdown on organized crime and corruption in Chongqing has been very popular.
sentences.chinese: 薄在重慶對有組織犯罪和腐敗的打擊也大快人心。

definition: guilty and deserves to be punished (idiom); entirely appropriate chastisement/the punishment fits the crime
righteous indignation fills one's breast (idiom); to feel indignant at injustice
to place righteousness before family (idiom); ready to punish one's own family if justice demands it
evil has its retribution (idiom); to suffer the consequences of one's bad deeds/sow the wind and reap the whirlwind (Hosea 8:7)
guilty of terrible crimes (idiom)/reprehensible
devoid of conscience (idiom); utterly heartless
lit. a thief crying "Stop the thief!" (idiom)/fig. to accuse sb of a theft and try to sneak away oneself/to cover up one's misdeeds by shifting the blame onto others
death cannot wipe out the crimes (idiom); dreadful crimes that rankled even after the perpetrator is dead
everybody celebrating together/universal celebration/universal rejoicing
to be the most ridiculous thing in the world (idiom)
pinyin: hua2 tian1 xia4 zhi1 da4 ji1

definition: lit. for one's face to reach rock bottom/to be thoroughly discredited (idiom)
lit. to try to steal a chicken only to end up losing the rice used to lure it (idiom)/fig. to try to gain an advantage only to end up worse off/to go for wool and come back shorn
pinyin: tou1 ji1 bu4 cheng2 shi2 ba3 mi3

definition: to despise/to hold in contempt
public anger/popular indignation
deranged/demented/berserk (idiom)
the whole truth is revealed (idiom); everything becomes clear
